ch0091_90_shirona/0101_0701_01_10:
Your eyes are shining as ever with motivation
today, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0091_90_shirona/0101_0701_02_10:
Keep refining your potential at your own
pace, OK?
ch0091_90_shirona/7101_0701_01_10:
Garchomp and I will keep battling and shining
brighter on bigger stages.
ch0091_90_shirona/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ve been feeling that way ever since this new
power awakened in us—my heart has been
pounding so hard!
ch0091_90_shirona/7102_0701_01_10:
When I battle in this outfit, Garchomp looks
happier than usual.
ch0091_90_shirona/7102_0701_02_10:
I think she’s pleased that I can bring out the
best in her.
ch0091_90_shirona/7102_0701_03_10:
...Well, I’m not entirely sure how she feels, but
that’s the impression I get.
ch0091_90_shirona/7103_0701_01_10: An Egg is the cradle of every being.
ch0091_90_shirona/7103_0701_02_10:
Life that comes from an Egg will come to an end
in due course to begin anew...
ch0091_90_shirona/7103_0701_03_10: This planet itself is an Egg, in a sense.
ch0091_90_shirona/7104_0701_01_10:
Arceus, who is said to have shaped the world,
has a mysterious power...
ch0091_90_shirona/7104_0701_02_10:
The power of possibly making life appear out
of nothing...
ch0091_90_shirona/7105_0701_01_10:
When I look at you, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
I tell myself...
ch0091_90_shirona/7105_0701_02_10:
“Don’t be satisfied with being a mere Champion!
Keep challenging yourself!”
ch0091_90_shirona/7105_0701_03_10:
Like you, I want to have fun and take on what
I can!
ch0091_90_shirona/1701_0701_01_10: Here’s something to show my support for you.
ch0091_90_shirona/1701_0702_01_10: I know you’ll never give up on a challenge!
ch0091_90_shirona/1701_0702_02_10: So, keep up the hard work!
ch0091_90_shirona/2501_0701_01_10:
Myths, ruins, and Pokémon are all interconnected
with each other.
ch0091_90_shirona/2501_0701_02_10:
Although the architecture of a given ruin will vary
depending on the climate of the region...
ch0091_90_shirona/2501_0701_03_10:
what many ruins have in common is that they
were initially built for worshipping Pokémon.
ch0091_90_shirona/2501_0702_01_10:
The Sinjoh Ruins, for example, were built to show
respect for Arceus.
ch0091_90_shirona/2501_0702_02_10:
So I believe the existence of ruins is strongly linked
to the presence of Pokémon.
ch0091_90_shirona/2511_0701_01_10:
I wonder how people and Pokémon interacted in
the days of myths...
ch0091_90_shirona/2511_0701_02_10:
Even the people of the Hisui region, who lived
long before the current era, were trying to unravel
those mysteries.
ch0091_90_shirona/2511_0701_03_10:
Perhaps someday I’ll have the chance to converse
with the people who created the myths.
ch0091_90_shirona/2511_0702_01_10:
The relationship between people and Pokémon
has changed over the course of time...
ch0091_90_shirona/2511_0702_02_10: Such is history, such is life.
ch0091_90_shirona/2511_0702_03_10:
I think it’s our duty to share our experiences with
the next generation so they can foster even
stronger relationships!
ch0091_90_shirona/3001_0701_01_10:
Time to rise and shine. You’ll want to brush away
that sleepiness to enjoy today to the fullest.
ch0091_90_shirona/3003_0701_01_10:
If you want to battle, I’ll take you on
anytime—with Garchomp, of course!
ch0091_90_shirona/3005_0701_01_10:
People in the past may have gazed at the stars
in the night sky, pondering the vastness of the
universe—just like us.
